quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkein
quotes.quote: There is some good in this world, and it's worth fighting for.

quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
quotes.quote: It is only with the heart that one can see rightly; what is essential is invisible to the eye.

quotes.author: Charlotte Bronte
quotes.quote: I am no bird; and no net ensnares me: I am a free human being with an independent will, which I now exert to leave you.

quotes.author: Charles Dickens
quotes.quote: It was the best of times, it was the worst of times, it was the age of wisdom, it was the age of foolishness, it was the epoch of belief, it was the epoch of incredulity, it was the season of Light, it was the season of Darkness, it was the spring of hope, it was the winter of despair.

quotes.author: Mary Shelley
quotes.quote: Beware; for I am fearless, and therefore powerful.

quotes.author: Harper Lee
quotes.quote: I wanted you to see what real courage is, instead of getting the idea that courage is a man with a gun in his hand. It’s when you know you’re licked before you begin but you begin anyway and you see it through no matter what. You rarely win, but sometimes you do.

quotes.author: John Steinbeck
quotes.quote: A man, after he has brushed off the dust and chips of his life, will have left only the hard, clean questions: Was it good or was it evil? Have I done well — or ill?

quotes.author: John Green
quotes.quote: The only way out of the labyrinth of suffering is to forgive.

quotes.author: William Shakespeare
quotes.quote: This above all: To thine own self be true, And it must follow, as the night the day, Thou canst not then be false to any man.

quotes.author: Sylvia Plath
quotes.quote: I took a deep breath and listened to the old brag of my heart: I am, I am, I am.

quotes.author: Toni Morrison
quotes.quote: Love is or it ain’t. Thin love ain’t love at all.

quotes.author: John Steinbeck
quotes.quote: Ever’body’s askin’ that. ‘What we comin’ to?’ Seems to me we don’t never come to nothin’. Always on the way.

quotes.author: Emily Bronte
quotes.quote: Whatever our souls are made of, his and mine are the same.

quotes.author: Zora Neale Hurston
quotes.quote: There are years that ask questions and years that answer.

quotes.author: J.K. Rowling
quotes.quote: It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live.
quotes.source: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone

quotes.author: J.K. Rowling
quotes.quote: It is our choices, Harry, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.
quotes.source: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets

quotes.author: Alexandre Dumas
quotes.quote: All human wisdom is summed up in these two words – ‘Wait and hope.

quotes.author: Anthony Doerr
quotes.quote: Open your eyes and see what you can with them before they close forever.
quotes.source: All the Light We Cannot See

quotes.author: Amy Tan
quotes.quote: Then you must teach my daughter this same lesson. How to lose your innocence but not your hope. How to laugh forever.

quotes.author: William Shakespeare
quotes.quote: All the world’s a stage, and all the men and women merely players. They have their exits and their entrances; And one man in his time plays many parts.
